content: [Winter Chat Topic 3]

content: Hold on—when am I supposed to sleep?!
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
Do you have that thing called "Supuling" where you're from?
I had a classmate who would get hay fever when spring came around,
He'd always talk about "Supuling" with a runny nose.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content: [Summer Chat Topic 1]

content: [Winter Chat Topic 4]

content:
Spring is warm and damp,
making it so easy to catch a cold.
Back home, Mom would definitely make me
drink three big bowls of that dark, bitter cold remedy tea every day.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
But—I only found out later!
"Spring" was actually what they called the season in his hometown,
And more importantly, <size=64>he wasn't even sick!</size>
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
I thought it was cold medicine.
I went around to different pharmacies looking for it, but couldn't find any.
In the end, I just recommended our family's traditional cold remedy tea.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
If ducks know about it, do geese know too?
What about wild geese? And seagulls?
I just can't figure it out—
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content: Looks like <color=#97c344>{homestar} Road</color> really is a feng shui treasure spot!

content:
<color=#97c344>{homestar} Road</color>
Everything's so lush and green now!
<size=64>Beautiful!</size>
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
But wait, there's more!
I've never had cold medicine or caught a cold
while living on <color=#97c344>{homestar} Street</color>.

content: [Summer Chat Topic 4]

content:
<size=30>Come to think of it though...
Is my family's traditional cold remedy
actually effective or not?</size>
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
One third of my time is spent practicing martial arts,
One third of my time is spent working part-time jobs,
And one third of my time is spent eating...
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
The early bird catches the worm, and spring is the time to plan for the year ahead.
Time to make this year's martial arts training schedule!
(counting on fingers) One plus one, two plus six...
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
There's a poem that says, "Ducks are the first to know when spring warms the river."
Why is it that ducks are the first to notice when the river waters turn warm in spring?
